description.message: Friends Mural is a Facebook client with a new approach. You decide which friends to feature on your mural, and we will show you their latest updates!

contactUs3.message: We welcome all constructive feedbacks in civilized languages. *wink*

copyright.message: Home | Blog | Twitter | Copyright 2010 Visibo Ltd. All rights reserved.

updatedMessage.message: Friends Mural for Facebook is updated, click here to see what's new

clickToAddFriend.message: Click to add this friend to Friends Mural

clickToRemoveFriend.message: Click to remove this friend from Friends Mural

ownerFeedIconStatusToggle.message: Toggle between friend status and your own status

clickHereToSeeTuto.message: Click here to see the tutorial again.

customWallpaper.message: Custom Wallpaper (enter a URL from the web, minimum 530x420px)

hideToolbarIcon2.message: Hide your own updates on the toolbar icon

unselectableDescription.message: (You can only choose 'Large mural picture size' when you have at most 12 friends on the Mural)

supportDevelopment.message: Support our development and share to your friends!

ownerFeedBodyFail.message: Your friend updates are not available at this time, please try again later.

friendListFail.message: Your friend list is not available at this time, please try again later

userFeedBodyFail.message: User status not available at this time, please try again later.

transientError.message: Error contacting Facebook, please try again later. If the problem persists, try logout and login again.

updateLimitReached.message: You have reached the maximum update limit, please try again later

addFriends.message: Add friends to your mural here >
